Mike Pence , on the House floor in January 2011, said, This legislation does not cut one penny from Title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at Title X clinics across this country- breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.[ http://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/pkg/CREC-2011-01-07/pdf/CREC-2011-01-07-pt1-PgH125-3.pdf#page=1]* FACT: Politico reports, "Republicans are looking to wipe out funding for Title X, a 40-year-old family planning program....
